string.text: {HERO} got Medicine skill experience: {MED_EXP} ({EXP_PERC} %)\nExperience needed in total: {MED_EXP_NEED}\nMedicine skill: {MED_SKILL}
Healing On Kill Based On Medicine Skill
Maximum medicine skill when healing stops increasing.\nAt this skill level hero will be healed by 'Maximum healing amount' setting below. [Default: 300]
Maximum health amount that a hero can be healed on enemy kill when his medicine skill reaches 'Medicine skill threshold'. [Default: 10]
Show hero vs hero on-screen notification
Shows on-screen notification when any hero koncks down another hero. [Default: Enabled]
Every alive hero in the game gets medicine skill experience when hero is healing from wounds after battle. [Default: Enabled]
Calculated experience will go through learning rate modifier as intended by the game. If disabled, heroes will get raw calculated experience as it is (as if learning rate is x1). [Default: Disabled]
(Medicine skill threshold / Current hero's medicine skill) / Experience percentage divisor = Percentage to earn experience for hero's medicine skill. [Default: 200]

Shows which specific hero kills an enemy and how much health he heals after kill.\nAlso shows calculated floating number which is rounded to determine actual healing amount in integer number.\nFormula: currentMedSkill / (maxMedSkillThreshold / maxHPToHeal). [Default: Disabled]
Shows detailed information of all heroes in the log, who gets medicine skill experience every hour. [Default: Disabled]
